entities.description: Unable to cut down or stop alcohol use more than one time past 12 months
Often wished to cut down or stop alcohol use past 12 months
Had any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or made worse by drinking alcohol past 12 months
Continued to use alcohol despite causing or worsening physical health problems past 12 months

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent was unable to cut down or stop alcohol use more than one time in the past 12 months
Indicates if the respondent often wished to cut down or stop alcohol use in the past 12 months
Indicates if the respondent had any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or made worse by drinking alcohol in the past 12 months
Indicates if the respondent continued to use alcohol despite it causing or worsening physical health problems in the past 12 months
